data.address: Of The Immovable Property : All That Piece And Parcel Of Immovable Property Bearing Flat No. B-903, Admeasuring About 1471 Square Feet On 9Th Floor, Of The Building Known As Shree Pleasant Palace Coop Housing Society Limited, Situated At Athwa, Bearing Revenue Survey No. 88/A And 88/B, Old Nondh No. 292/A And 293/A, New Nondh No. 2563, 2564 And 2566, T.
